Transcript:
Alison: It's gone. The heart with our names in it, mine and Rafe's, it's 
gone. Livvie. God, Livvie must have worn it away. But she can't -- she can't 
erase our love. Not ever.
Rafe: That feels so good.
Livvie: How good?
Rafe: So good.

Livvie: You know, you always used to love it when I touched you like this. So 
close your eyes. Close your eyes and just let yourself feel. Feel how much I 
love you. Feel it in my fingers.

Alison's Voice: I touched his face, and he smiled and -- and then I just 
touched his arm, and he would, like, shiver, you know? And it would make me 
shiver, and then we would shiver together.
Livvie: Shiver. There. You see? Now, that's the sign. That's how I know.
Rafe: Know what?

Livvie: That you really are happy. It's that little shiver that goes up your 
spine that tells me you are all mine.
Rafe: Thank you for helping me learn how to love again.

Livvie: Well, thank you for teaching me how to make love. You know, it was 
always so incredible. Well -- no, no, no, not yet.
Rafe: What?
Livvie: But I promise, it'll be worth it. I promise.

Ian: I got to go through with it -- for Lucy. Got to see through to the end, 
whatever the end may be. Just got a migraine.

Chris: No, this isn't just a migraine. There's been some sort of shock to 
your system.
Lucy: Hi. I found the aspirin for you. Here you go.
Ian: Oh, thanks. Thank you.
Lucy: Um -- thank you. Really -- thank you for doing this.
Ian: Anything, you know that.

Lucy: I know, but I hope you know, if there was any other way that I could 
think of to try to do this, I would. I know how much this is taking out of you. 
You probably would like some water with those aspirin. I'll get you some. 
Listen, I am very glad that it's you Kevin decided to communicate to after 
everything we've been through.
Ian: Don't leave me like this.

Lucy: I'm -- I'm just going to run and get you some water. I'll be right 
back.
Ian: I need you.
Lucy: What?
Ian: You're all I been thinking about. I need to be with you.
[Captioning made possible by ABC, Inc., and SOAPnet]
Rafe: I -- I thought you wanted this.

Livvie: I do. I really, really do. I've been waiting so long for this moment, 
Rafe, so long to make love to you again, but I -- I really want to look 
beautiful for you.
Rafe: You already do.

Livvie: Shh. Just give me a couple of minutes, ok? I want this to be really 
special, something you'll remember always.

Rafe: That's what I want, too. I want to remember everything. Oh, my God, 
you've been so patient, so incredibly patient and caring, and I just want to be 
able to give you everything -- everything you want, everything you need.
Livvie: You will, Rafe, I promise, you will.
Rafe: I'll always try.
Livvie: I won't be long.
Livvie: Rafe?
Rafe: Yeah, what -- what is it?
Livvie: How about lighting a fire and turning on some music?
Rafe: Sure, I -- ok. I could do that. I don't mind. Not at all.
Lucy: Ian, what are you -- what are you saying? I don't understand.
Ian: Lucy, I need you --

Kevin: So much. Nothing else matters. I just want to hold you in my arms and 
never let go. I miss you so much.
Lucy: Doc -- it's you. Doc?
Ian: It feels like part of me is missing.
Lucy: I miss you, too, so much.
Ian: You were always there, and now you're gone.
Lucy: No, I'm not gone, I'm right here. Can't you feel me? I'm right here.
Ian: I want to touch you, reach out and take your hand.

Lucy: I know. I want to find you. I know you have reached out to me. I know 
you're alive.

Kevin: I know you're as desperate as I am, wondering what happened. 
Concentrate, Lucy. The connection you believe we've always had, I'm trying to --
Ian: Get back to you.

Lucy: I know. I know, and I'm trying to find you. I'm trying. You keep 
trying. Would you try? Come on, Doc, try!
Ian: I'm --

Kevin: Trying, Lucy. I'm trying with everything I have, with all my love. I'm 
thinking of you. Only you.
Rebecca: I thought you might be in need of refreshment.
Kevin: What? Will you leave me alone, please?
Rebecca: My apologies. I never meant to intrude.
Kevin: Oh. I'm -- I'm sorry. I'm sorry. I -- I was just --
Rebecca: Just what?

Kevin: Well, it's kind of hard to explain. I was -- I was trying to let my 
wife know that I'm all right. Sounds foolish, I know.

Rebecca: Not at all. I was able to speak through my portrait, and I believe 
there are other ways. I know belief is the source of all power. And I still 
believe that love can move mountains. So why not?
Kevin: Yeah, why not? Power of love. Ok, come on. Power of love.
Ian: Come on!
Lucy: Ian -- Ian, you got to calm down.
Ian: Oh!
Lucy: Ian!
Ian: God!
Lucy: Doc? Oh, my God! Ian -- Ian, let him go. You got to let him go.
Ian: I can't. I --

Lucy: Listen -- listen to me. You connected. You connected. I felt Doc. I 
heard him. Please let him go.
Ian: I'm trapped.

Lucy: No, you -- listen, release whatever connection you have with him. Let 
him go. Stop it!
Ian: I need to come home to you, Lucy.
Lucy: Ian, stop! Just stop it! Ian, please, let him go!

Alison: See, Livvie, you thought that by ruining a thing or a symbol, it 
would actually mean something, but I don't -- I don't need names on a wall to 
remember Rafe. I don't actually need anything. Like I could ever forget him or 
like I ever would.

Alison's Voice: Loving you -- it's changed my life and it's changed me and 
that's something to celebrate. It's something to rejoice in. Let's do that. 
Let's stand before God, just you and me, right here, right now. And let's -- 
let's make a promise to each other, a vow that even though we won't really be 
together, our hearts will always be joined for all eternity. Will you do that 
with me? Will you marry me?
Rafe's Voice: I'm ready if you are.
Alison's Voice: It looks beautiful.

Rafe's Voice: So do you, angel. I've never seen anything more beautiful in my 
life. Alison Barrington, I promise that I will carry our love with me forever, 
that we will be joined together as one, for now, and into eternity.

Alison's Voice: And I promise you, Rafe Kovich, to carry your love with me 
forever. And my heart and soul belongs to you from now and through eternity.
Rafe's Voice: And now, under the eyes of God, we belong to each other.
Alison's Voice: Now you may kiss your bride.

Alison: God, we made so many promises together. But I need to stop feeling so 
sorry for myself and so sad about what's gone. And I just need to move on. But I 
love you, Rafe Kovich. I don't want you to ever, ever forget that, because I 
never will. I will carry you in my heart forever for as long as I live.
[Music playing]

Rebecca: Do you think you were able to forge a connection of any kind with 
your wife?

Kevin: I -- I wish I knew. I -- it seemed for a moment, I felt -- I don't 
know. I just know that if it were Lucy, she'd go to the ends of the earth and 
back.
Rebecca: I believe you, Kevin. I really do. It's only --
Kevin: What? Only what?

Rebecca: This place, unfortunately, exists somewhere beyond the world and its 
traditional ends.
Ian: What just happened here? What was that?

Lucy: It -- it was Doc. Ian, listen to me. It happened again. He connected 
through you and he was talking through you. I know it was Doc. It was his words. 
I'm sure of it.
Ian: At least somebody's sure of something. I don't remember.

Lucy: Can you remember anything? Did you -- did you see anything? What -- 
what did you feel?

Ian: I remember seeing you through a fog, talking. And this piercing pain in 
my head. It was like my whole body was coming apart at the seams. Like I was 
going to pass out.

Rebecca: I really do think you'll feel better once you've had something to 
eat.

Kevin: Do you think I'm in the mood for a picnic? Don't you understand yet 
what your trick with your candle has done to our lives?

Rebecca: Of course I do, but it was your daughter, Livvie, who made it into a 
permanent problem by slashing --
Kevin: What? What? Whoa, whoa, wait!
Rebecca: And it was her --
Kevin: Permanent?
Rebecca: Action that has condemned you to my world indefinitely.
Kevin: No! No, Not indefinitely. That, I will not accept.

Rebecca: I've been here for over 100 years. Don't you think if there was a 
way to get out, I would have found it? So just like me, you may never leave. 
Forgive me, Kevin.
Kevin: No!

Lucy: Here's your water. I just wish to God we could figure out why hooking 
up with Kevin is so hard on you.
Ian: No, damn it, no!
Lucy: Oh. Ian.
Ian: No, it's not true.
Lucy: What? What isn't true?
Ian: I won't stay here!
Lucy: Where? Where -- where are you?
Kevin: It took me years to get to where I am with the woman I love!

Ian: Lucy is my lifeline. Her love is what keeps me alive, the one thing that 
I can count on!
Luy: Yeah. Yes, Doc, you can count on that, you can.
Kevin: I will find my way back to her.
Ian: I don't know how, but I will!
Kevin: Or die trying because that's the world I belong in, not here!
Rebecca: You have no idea --

Ian: No, damn it! I will not stay here! Whatever it takes, I will not stay 
here with you, Rebecca!
Lucy: Rebecca?
Ian: I won't! I won't, I won't.

Lucy: God. My God -- Ian -- Rebecca. That's it -- Doc is with Rebecca! Ian, 
that makes sense. It makes complete sense. Don't you see? If we find Rebecca, 
then we find Doc. We can bring him back, but how? How? We have to have a seance. 
No -- Rebecca's dead. Doc's not dead. There has to be some explanation. How 
could Doc be with her when he's not dead? It doesn't make any sense. Ian, if we 
can figure this out, though, we -- Ian? Oh, my God! Ian!

Alison: I know that you're with me, Rafe, and you always will be, even if I 
never see you again in this lifetime.
Vendor: Flower, beautiful lady?
Alison: I'm sorry -- what?
Vendor: Well, beautiful young lady, sad and alone on such a lovely night?
Alison: Yeah.
Vendor: Eh.
Alison: Oh.
Vendor: Here, for you, no charge.

Alison: Oh, that's really sweat of you. Actually, I couldn't. You know what, 
though? I -- I might take one perfect pink rose, if I may. I mean, I'll pay you, 
of course. I mean, I have some money that I could --

Vendor: I wish I had one left to sell. Yeah, this afternoon, all my pink 
roses went home with a very romantic young guy. A real angel.
Alison: Angel?

Rafe: Ok. I got everything -- candles, the music, the pillows. Everything -- 
everything's just perfect. It's just so --
Livvie: Rafe?
Rafe: Perfect. Wow, you are so --
Livvie: So --
Rafe: Beautiful.
Livvie: I love you, Rafe Kovich. Make love to me.
Livvie: It's our roses. A bed of our pink roses.
Rafe: Livvie --
Livvie: Yeah?
Rafe: When you do that to me, it's -- it's like -- almost -- ah, Livvie --
Livvie: Shh. I don't have to hear anything. I see it all in your eyes.
Rafe: You are so warm.
Livvie: Yes.
Rafe: So good.
Livvie: Yes. Rafe.

Rafe: I want you now. I want you now. I need you -- forever -- so much. Oh, 
so much, Alison.
>> on the next "Port Charles" --

Chris: I can't treat you unless I know what's going on. What was he doing 
right before this all started?
Lucy: We were channeling Kevin.
Jack: I thought you said Rafe was gone.
Alison: I know, I -- I thought so, too, but I think he's come back to me.
